name: Jordan Retro 11 "Gamma" Preorder (GS)
description:
Jordan Retro 11 "Gamma" 
MODEL: 378037-006 
COLOR: Black/Gamma Blue-Black-Varsity Maize
RELEASE DATE: December 21, 2013

Please note that this product is for a grade school (youth) model and is NOT a men's pair. The actual product may vary slightly from pictured image as provided image is a men's pair. 

ThirtySevenKicks (unless otherwise stated) only sells brand new shoes. This means they are still factory laced and never tried on.

ThirtySevenKicks only sells the most authentic items. All of our shoes are guaranteed 100% authentic. This means no fakes, variants, b-grades, etc.

This item is considered a preorder. We guarantee all preorders to ship on the next business day (or a few days later, depending on where we receive the product from). In the rare event that we are unable to fulfill your order, we will provide a 100% full refund to you.

Unless otherwise stated, all products come in their original packaging with provided items. This may include: box, paper, hangtag, retro card, extra laces, etc.

ThirtySevenKicks only ships USPS Priority Mail. That means 2-3 business days to anywhere in the United States. Unless otherwise stated, shipping is free and provided at no charge to the buyer.

If you are interested in purchasing internationally (outside of the United States), please email us before purchase at info@thirtysevenkicks.com.

Once purchase is completed, absolutely no refunds, returns, exchanges, or cancellations will be made. All sales are final on ThirtySevenKicks.com. We reserve the right to cancel/refund any order at any time.
